title: People Defamed as Jews
common: On this page, we list families that were labeled as Jewish, either to incite persecution or due to errors in research. All families that were defamed as Jewish in São Paulo by the Camargo family during the civil war are identified with "(Pires x Camargo)" (Taunay, Affonso d'E., , 36-68).
The term "defamation" is closely linked to the Inquisition era, and it should not be used in the same context today.

value.name: Portuguese Inquisition:
value.desc: In the Portuguese Inquisition level of the game Scientific Method, players are invited to explore how the Inquisition manipulated lawsuits to fabricate false accusations of Judaism.

value.name: The Leme (Pires X Camargo):
value.desc: This family was "labeled" as Jewish during the civil war due to Fernão Dias Paes marrying a Betim.
